value.value: @concat('select Id,Product2.Id,Product2.Product_Key__c,CurrencyIsoCode from PriceBookEntry where IsActive=true',if(greater(lastindexof(activity('getProdKeys').output.firstRow.keys,','),90000),'',concat(' and Product2.Product_Key__c in (',activity('getProdKeys').output.firstRow.keys,')')))

query.value: @concat('select Id,Name from Opportunity where Crown_Quote_ID__c in (',activity('getOppKeys').output.firstRow.keys,')')
@concat('select Id,Name,Morgan_External_ID__c from Opportunity where Morgan_External_ID__c in (',activity('getOppKeys').output.firstRow.keys,')')
